data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, subject source, and source subject ID of participants with B-cell lymphoma and involved in the "Detection of Enhancer-Associated Rearrangements Reveals Mechanisms of Oncogene Dysregulation in B-cell Lymphoma" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository
